attributes.action: Reduce the UK fuel duty and tax rates to the average rates of all UN member states.
attributes.additional_details: In the UK we pay some of the highest rates of taxes and duties in the world for petrol and diesel and this adversely affects many aspects of UK life. This petition seeks an immediate reduction in the UK rates of fuel duties and taxes to the average rates of the member states of the United Nations and to then review and maintain this average rate annually.
